name: demureness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(used especially of women) the quality of being quiet and well behaved: Despite her demureness, she accepted his invitation. Her high-necked dress suggested demureness. See
demure
More examplesFewer examplesHigh voices used to be associated with demureness in women.She folded her hands in self-aware demureness.Her voice is soft, and she nearly tiptoes when she walks which gives an effect of demureness.
